price: Yeroo suuraan (isaan saaxiltu) takka buufamte, gariin isaanii gara garii isaanii ilaala “namni tokko sila isin argaa jiraa?” jedhaa. Sana booda garagalanii deemu. Rabbiin onneewwan isaanii garagalche Waan isaan ummata hubannoo hin qabne ta’aniif.
arabic: وَإِذَا مَآ أُنزِلَتۡ سُورَةٞ نَّظَرَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضٍ هَلۡ يَرَىٰكُم مِّنۡ أَحَدٖ ثُمَّ ٱنصَرَفُواْۚ صَرَفَ ٱللَّهُ قُلُوبَهُم بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَفۡقَهُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā mā unzilat sūratun naẓara baʿḍuhum ilā baʿḍin hal yarākum min aḥadin thumma inṣarafū ṣarafa al-lahu qulūbahum bi-annahum qawmun lā yafqahūna
